nets.name: Mid-South SKYWARN Net
nets.schedule: 1st day of each month at 7:00 PM CST
nets.description: Monthly severe weather preparedness net covering the Mid-South region. Focus on SKYWARN spotter training and severe weather communications.

nets.name: Mid-South DMR Net
nets.description: Weekly general DMR net for the Mid-South area. Open discussion, check-ins, and DMR technical topics welcome.

_example_weekly_net._comment: Example weekly net - remove underscore prefix to activate
_example_weekly_net.name: Your Weekly Net
_example_weekly_net.description: Weekly check-in net for local area operators.

_example_monthly_net._comment: Example monthly net - remove underscore prefix to activate
_example_monthly_net.name: Your Monthly Emergency Net
_example_monthly_net.schedule: First Tuesday of each month at 7:00 PM CST
_example_monthly_net.description: Monthly emergency preparedness and training net.
